_meanings:
{@--3@} ({%a%}) To place near; <ls>Mv. 4. 56.</ls>
({%b%}) To put to or yoke (as a horse to a
carriage &c.).

{@--4@} To cause, bring
on or produce; <ls>Mk. 1. 53.</ls>

{@--5@} To
impose, entrust with, charge with
(as a duty); {#tadupahitakuduMbaH#}  
<ls>R. 7. 71.</ls>

{@--13@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To
precede without the intervention
of another syllable.
